entry.source: It is I, Abbot Hugo, leader of the Monastery.{F801}We seek to acquire more relics to further{F801}develop our nation, but we lack the{F801}"electricity" to run them. According to{F801}ancient texts, a relic called a {F804,5}wind{F801}turbine generator{F804,0} can create it. Find one.{F801}
